features.featureTitle: Add an in-app “Publishing & Deployment” help section that explains (in English) how to publish the app and what to do if a deploy/build fails, including a clear instruction that if deployment fails the user should rerun deployment, and a checklist for what to try when changes are not visible after a successful deploy (hard refresh, reset app cache, disable offline cache/service worker). Place this section on the Account Status page so it is easy to find.

Extend the existing Pre-Publish Gate UI to include a small “Post-deploy verification” subsection (English) with 3–5 checkboxes focused on confirming the new version is actually live (e.g., verify footer/version-visible change, reload without stale cache, confirm key routes load). Include a short note that if verification fails due to stale assets, use the Troubleshooting tools to clear caches and then retry verification.
